metadata.title: Maps of the Surface Circulation of the Gulf of Alaska

creators.name: Oceans Canada - Pacific Region, Institute of Ocean Science

metadata.description: Argos drifters were deployed in the Gulf of Alaska to assess current regimes.  Yearly average and monthly surface circulation and velocity maps were created using monthly temperature and salinity observations.  The maps beginning January 2002 are available on the web.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To assess current regimes in the Gulf of Alaska.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Continually

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Contact Source.
